name: Rigs of Rods Texture Reference File
summary: Learn about .MATERIAL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Valid texture files are in .PNG, .JPG, and .DDS formats, and DDS is the recommended format.

description: File used by Rigs of Rods, an open source truck, car, airplane, and boat simulator; contains nested instructions and properties that reference a particular 3D model, such as a truck, to a texture file; specifies textures that are declared in a corresponding .TRUCK file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .material file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: MATERIAL file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
